question: Will Switzerland win the 2024 Euros?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Switzerland wins the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

​​If it is determined at any point that it is impossible for this team to win the UEFA European Football Championship based on the rules of the tournament (e.g. they're eliminated from competition), this market will immediately resolve to "No."

If the UEFA European Football Championship is not held in 2024 this market will resolve to "No".

question: Will Turkey win the 2024 Euros?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Turkey wins the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

​​If it is determined at any point that it is impossible for this team to win the UEFA European Football Championship based on the rules of the tournament (e.g. they're eliminated from competition), this market will immediately resolve to "No."

If the UEFA European Football Championship is not held in 2024 this market will resolve to "No".

question: Roaring Kitty charged in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any Federal or State jurisdiction of the United States formally charges or otherwise announces a criminal indictment of Keith Gill ("Roaring Kitty") by December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

For the purposes of this market the District of Columbia and any county, municipality, or other subdivision of a State shall be included within the definition of a State.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from US governmental sources, however a wide consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Roaring Kitty tweet on Monday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if @TheRoaringKitty posts/tweets again, between June 3, 2024, 12:00 AM ET and 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, all quote and reply posts/tweets count toward a "Yes" resolution, but reposts/retweets will not count.

The resolution source for this market will be Roaring Kitty's verified X/Twitter account: https://twitter.com/TheRoaringKitty.

Please note, only the @TheRoaringKitty verified X/Twitter account counts for this market, regardless of the URL for this profile. If Roaring Kitty posts/tweets from another account, it has no bearing on the resolution of this market.

events.title: Will Roaring Kitty tweet on Monday?

question: Was Roaring Kitty GME YOLO update fake?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if definitive evidence is released that DeepFuckingValue's June 2 GME Yolo update posted on reddit was fake (https://www.reddit.com/r/Superstonk/comments/1d6r5vp/gme_yolo_update_june_2_2024/), meaning that the size of the GME positions in the account was not accurate and/or made up. This market will resolve to "No" otherwise. 

If no definitive evidence is released prior to June 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Was Roaring Kitty GME YOLO update fake?

question: $GME market cap >$10b at Monday close?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the market cap of GameStop Corp. (GME) is above $10 billion as of market close on June 3, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The market capitalization of GameStop Corp. will be determined by checking Google Finance’s “Market Cap” metric for GME at the time of market close for June 3, 2024 (website: https://www.google.com/finance/quote/GME:NYSE?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjmxc3alYuGAxXek4kEHaweDnYQ3ecFegQIOBAZ&window=5D).

If Google Finance’s market cap data for GME is not available by June 3, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible source for market capitalization on June 3, market close, will be used to resolve this market.

question: Berkshire Hathaway closes above $600k today?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Berkshire Hathaway Inc Class A (BRK.A) stock is trading at over $600,000.00 on market close on June 3, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve solely based on the "Close" figure found on the "HISTORIC PRICES" chart on BRK.A's NYSE page (https://www.nyse.com/quote/XNYS:BRK.A). If the resolution source is down or delayed at market close, this market will remain open until it returns or is otherwise updated.

If BRK.A price is undefined on the "HISTORIC PRICES" chart for "Close" for this date by the time table data is updated for June 4, 2024, this market will resolve to "No".

question: Fauci jail in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Former Chief Medical Advisor to the President Anthony Fauci serves any time in a federal, state, or local U.S. jail or prison between June 2 and December 31, 2024, by 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the U.S. Government, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Hunter Biden sentenced to prison before election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hunter Biden is sentenced to spend any time in custody of a jail or prison, as part of his ongoing federal firearms charges trial, by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve immediately based on the first sentence passed in this case, regardless of appeals. If the first sentencing in this case does not include jail or prison time, this market will resolve to "No".

If this trial ends (e.g. mistrial) without the rendering of a sentence, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

This market will resolve according to the initial judgment rendered in this case. Any appeals will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from involved government(s), however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Hunter Biden in jail before election day?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hunter Biden spends at least 48 consecutive hours in custody in a jail or prison between June 2 and November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from involved government(s), however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Trump 10M TikTok followers by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump's TikTok account @realdonaldtrump reaches 10 million followers by 11:59 PM ET, June 7, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be the official follower counter for @realdonaldtrump.

question: Trump posts another TikTok by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if @realdonaldtrump posts another video on TikTok between June 3, 3:00 PM ET and June 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Any new post which appears under the "Videos" section of @realdonaldtrump's verified TikTok channel will qualify for a "Yes" resolution. 

The resolution source for this market will be Donald J. Trump's verified TikTok channel: https://www.tiktok.com/@realdonaldtrump.

Please note, only the @realdonaldtrump verified TikTok channel counts for this market, regardless of the URL for this profile. If Donald J. Trump posts from another account, it has no bearing on the resolution of this market.

events.title: Trump posts another TikTok by Friday?

question: Eminem's "Houdini" debuts #1 on Billboard hot 100?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Eminem's ‘Houdini’ debuts at #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from Billboard.

question: Trump’s first TikTok >100M views by Friday?
description:
On June 1, @realdonaldtrump made his first Tiktok post (see https://www.tiktok.com/@realdonaldtrump/video/7375744699140721963).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump's first TikTok video reaches 100 million views by June 7, 2024 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source will be the official view count for Trump's first Tiktok as displayed on Trump's TikTok account.

events.title: Trump’s first TikTok >100M views by Friday?

question: Biden-Hur tape released in June?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the full or partial audio recording of President Biden's interview with Special Counsel Robert Hur is released by June 30, 2024 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

A leaked recording will qualify for a "Yes" resolution if the authenticity of the recording is confirmed. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the DOJ, however, a credible consensus of reporting may also be used.
